template.name: Starlink dish by Prom
template.description:
Use project Python starlink-grpc-tools
https://github.com/sparky8512/starlink-grpc-tools
Run Starlink exporter: python dish_grpc_prometheus.py status alert_detail

item.name: Starlink alerts
item.description: A bit field combining all active alerts, where a 1 bit indicates the alert is active. See alert detail status data for which bits correspond with each alert, or to get individual alert flags instead of a combined bit mask.

item.name: Starlink currently obstructed
item.description: Most recent sample value. See *obstructed* in bulk history data for detail. This item still appears to be reported by the user terminal despite no longer appearing in the bulk history data.

item.name: Starlink direction azimuth
item.description: Azimuth angle, in degrees, of the direction in which the user terminal's dish antenna is physically pointing. Note that this generally is not the exact direction of the satellite with which the user terminal is communicating.

item.name: Starlink direction elevation
item.description: Elevation angle, in degrees, of the direction in which the user terminal's dish antenna is physically pointing.

item.name: Starlink downlink throughput bps
item.description: Most recent sample value. See bulk history data for detail.

item.name: Starlink fraction obstructed
item.description: The fraction of total area (or possibly fraction of time?) that the user terminal has determined to be obstructed between it and the satellites with which it communicates.

item.name: Starlink hardware version
item.description: A string identifying the user terminal hardware version.

item.name: Starlink ID
item.description: A string identifying the specific user terminal device that was reachable from the local network. Something like a serial number.

item.name: Starlink obstruction duration
item.description: Average consecutive time, in seconds, the user terminal has detected its signal to be obstructed for a period of time that it considers "prolonged", or None if no such obstructions were recorded.

item.name: Starlink obstruction interval
item.description: Average time, in seconds, between the start of such "prolonged" obstructions, or None if no such obstructions were recorded.

item.name: Starlink ping latency
item.description: Most recent sample value. See bulk history data for detail.

item.name: Starlink pop ping drop rate
item.description: Most recent sample value. See bulk history data for detail.

item.name: Starlink seconds obstructed
item.description:
The amount of time within the history buffer, in seconds, that the user terminal determined to be obstructed, regardless of whether or not packets were able to be transmitted or received.
**OBSOLETE**: The user terminal no longer provides this data.

item.name: Starlink seconds to first nonempty slot
item.description: Amount of time from now, in seconds, until a satellite will be scheduled to be available for transmit/receive. See also *scheduled* in the bulk history data. May report as a negative number, which appears to indicate unknown time until next satellite scheduled and usually correlates with *state* reporting as other than "CONNECTED".

item.name: Starlink snr above noise floor
item.description:
Most recent sample value. See bulk history data for detail.
**OBSOLETE**: The user terminal no longer provides this data.

item.name: Starlink software version
item.description: A string identifying the software currently installed on the user terminal.

trigger.expression: last(/Starlink dish by Prom/starlink.software_version,#1)<>last(/Starlink dish by Prom/starlink.software_version,#2) and length(last(/Starlink dish by Prom/starlink.software_version))>0
trigger.name: Starlink firmware has changed
trigger.description: Firmware version has changed. Ack to close

item.name: Starlink state
item.description:
As string describing the current connectivity state of the user terminal. One of:
"UNKNOWN", "CONNECTED", "BOOTING", "SEARCHING", "STOWED", "THERMAL_SHUTDOWN", "NO_SATS", "OBSTRUCTED", "NO_DOWNLINK", "NO_PINGS"

trigger.expression: last(/Starlink dish by Prom/starlink.state,#1)<>last(/Starlink dish by Prom/starlink.state,#2) and length(last(/Starlink dish by Prom/starlink.state))>0
trigger.name: Starlink status has changed
trigger.description: Status has changed. Ack to close

item.name: Starlink status alert install pending
item.description: Alert corresponding with bit 7 (bit mask 128) in *alerts*.

trigger.name: Starlink alert install pending
trigger.description: Starlink alert install pending. Ack to close

item.name: Starlink status alert is heating
item.description: Alert corresponding with bit 8 (bit mask 256) in *alerts*.

trigger.name: Starlink alert Terminal is heating
trigger.description: Starlink alert Terminal is heating. Ack to close

item.name: Starlink status alert mast not near vertical
item.description: Alert corresponding with bit 4 (bit mask 16) in *alerts*.

trigger.name: Starlink alert Terminal mast not near vertical
trigger.description: Starlink alert Terminal mast not near vertical. Ack to close

item.name: Starlink status alert motors stuck
item.description: Alert corresponding with bit 0 (bit mask 1) in *alerts*.

trigger.name: Starlink alert motors stuck
trigger.description: Starlink alert motors stuck. Ack to close

item.name: Starlink status alert power supply thermal throttle
item.description: Alert corresponding with bit 9 (bit mask 512) in *alerts*.

item.name: Starlink status alert roaming
item.description: Alert corresponding with bit 6 (bit mask 64) in *alerts*.

item.name: Starlink status alert slow ethernet speeds
item.description: Alert corresponding with bit 5 (bit mask 32) in *alerts*.

item.name: Starlink status alert thermal shutdown
item.description: Alert corresponding with bit 1 (bit mask 2) in *alerts*.

item.name: Starlink status alert thermal throttle
item.description: lert corresponding with bit 2 (bit mask 4) in *alerts*.

item.name: Starlink status alert unexpected location
item.description: Alert corresponding with bit 3 (bit mask 8) in *alerts*.

item.name: Starlink uplink throughput bps
item.description: Most recent sample value. See bulk history data for detail.

item.name: Starlink uptime
item.description:
The amount of time, in seconds, since the user terminal last rebooted.
Starlink uptime in 'N days, hh:mm:ss' format.

item.name: Starlink: Get dish data
item.description: Getting data from a starlink prometeus exporter - Python project starlink-grpc-tools.

trigger.name: starlink_exporter is not available (or no data for 30m)
trigger.description: Failed to fetch starlink metrics from starlink_exporter in time.
